divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was just hovering over the sw portion of ottumwa. the night was clear, the moon was high and so were the stars. this was way too low to be a star and way too bright. it was very very bright with a white light all around it. saw this as my brother and i left work. i thought it could be the same ufo i have previously seen twice already. but it was not flashing its lights at us this time. we just went home since we have seen it before and it was late.
Summary: hovering bright round shape above ottumwa
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ottumwa
There was one other sighting in Ottumwa on or around November 2nd 2009
